verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To the cross I look, to the cross I cling Of its suffering I do drink Of its work I do sing For on it my Savior both bruised and crushed Showed that God is love And God is just{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}At the cross You beckon me You draw me gently to my knees, and I am Lost for words, so lost in love, I’m sweetly broken, wholly surrendered{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What a priceless gift, undeserved life Have I been given Through Christ crucified You’ve called me out of death You’ve called me into life And I was under Your wrath Now through the cross I’m reconciled{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
